title: #59 - Deadmau5
description: On this episode of The H3 Podcast we are joined by Joel Zimmerman aka Deadmau5! Together we discuss his new orchestral album "Where's The Drop?", near death experiences, the state of EDM, and beefing on twitter. Joel (not George) is a legendary DJ, producer, label head and entrepreneur. His new album, "Where's The Drop?", is out March 30th as a timed exclusive on Tidal.
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
